description: ADU permitting programs: new ADU construction, detached ADU pre-approval, and unit legalization

services: Design units meeting safety and livability codes
Permit Review Roundtable for State Program ADUs

requirements.street_trees: One street tree per every 20 feet of frontage bordering public right of way
requirements.local_program_notice: Post notice 15 days before submitting Local program ADU applications

detached_adu_pre_approval.description: Building designers submit detached ADU plans for official approval; once approved, plans can be used for multiple site-specific projects
detached_adu_pre_approval.design_standard: Plans must be designed for 25-foot lots
detached_adu_pre_approval.code_cycle_validity: Pre-approval valid only during current code cycle; resubmission required if codes change
geographic_restrictions: Cannot be used in slope protection areas
Cannot be used in landslide/liquefaction zones
Cannot be used in Maher Zones
Cannot be used in flood zones
required_documents: Completed detached ADU pre-approval application form
Structural calculations (maximum probable dead load design)
review_elements: Habitable room sizes and ceiling heights
Window size, natural light and ventilation
Gravity, wind and seismic code compliance
Dead loads, fire ratings, egress paths
post_approval_process: Permit Review Roundtable scheduled for feedback
Designer makes revisions for code compliance

unit_legalization.description: Program to legalize residential units built before 2013 without permits

eligibility.requirement: Must be an independent space where someone can live full-time without walking through the main house

steps.title: Feasibility check
steps.detail: Hire CA-licensed architect, contractor, or civil/structural engineer to assess code compliance

steps.title: Building permit application
steps.detail: Submit 2 sets of plans. Fees 6-9% of building costs (half upfront). Can get separate permit for additional work.

steps.title: Department review
steps.detail: Quality review, routing to Planning/DBI/Fire. Plan review via Bluebeam. Planning issues Notice of Special Restriction (must be notarized and recorded at Assessor's office).

steps.title: Street tree permit
steps.detail: Free to apply. In-lieu fee: $2,193 per tree. Submit checklist even if not planting.

steps.title: Construction
steps.detail: Receive job card. Schedule inspections before covering work.

steps.title: Final completion
steps.detail: Certificate of final completion issued after final inspection.
